reviewText: After about 25min of play I had 2 crashes, multiple times where the camera and the things I was controlling would go anywhere they wanted.\nThe game at least to my experience, is all over the place.  It has potetial and if it is fixed it could make an ok game, especially for younger ages.  But at the current (12th of July 2015) state, ehh, yeah...\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLfP1QDTJ2Y

reviewText: Very nice game! I like the animations and the control is well explained in the help section.  The characters are cute and I like how they all have their own powers and have to work together to get to the next level. The game is easy to play and it is fun to find solutions to overcome the obstacles.\n

reviewText:
Personally i wouldn't recommend this game because the game isn't very smooth(the game feels a bit buggy).

Pro's :
- Some levels are fun(but these are hard to find)

Cons :
- Graphics are terrible
-Gameplay isn't smooth
-weird random loud sound effects(very cheap ones)
- Easy animations
-Death animation is buggy
-Checkpoints are hard to find(I needed to do the tutorial all over again after finishing it.
-Controls aren't explained at the beginning(Had to look for them in the menu.)


I'd give this game a 3/10, it might be fun to play if you can pick it up for just one dollar but 10$ is way above the game's quality.

Steam refund was luckly my saviour!

reviewText:
I like this game overall.
If you want a cute game, that is child friendly, easily learnable, then this is a definite must get.

Being a puzzle game, it is a nice simple challenge that involves 4 different characters.
Each character has a special ability, i.e. manipulation, blocking of missiles, destruction of road blockages, and last but not least, crossing chasms, and filling chasms.

The graphics look good, and the gameplay is not stressful, and overall enjoyable.

I do recommend this game for others.

However, that said, some of the levels get repetitive, and I feel that there are some issues that could improve the overall gaming experience.

Good points:
Cute characters.
Good puzzling (although repetitive.)
Simple enough for younger kids

Bad Points:
Not being able to move multiple characters simultaneous.
Endless clicking to move characters, rather than mouseclick hold.
Repetitive gameplay, especially the bridge" levels."
